ROOPA PARVATHANENI 
Elkridge, MD 21075 | 817-807-5630 | Email: sysroopa@gmail.com 
 
SUMMARY: I am a Certified Scrum Master with 19+ years of professional experience in Information 
Technology with extensive experience in developing, testing and deploying complex applications. I am 
also experienced in performing roles of Business Analyst, 508 Compliance tester, Performance 
Tester, Automation Tester, Manual testing and QA Lead in large to medium sized corporations. I am 
team player with strong interpersonal, organizational and communication skills both written and 
verbal with ability to interface with internal and external business and technical units. 
 
SKILLS 
Education Bachelor's Degree (Mechanical Engineering) 
Certifications CSM (Certified Scrum Master)

Performance Testing, User Acceptance Testing, Client-server Applications and Web-

• Led end-to-end development of Tableau dashboard, including data preparation, visualization 
design, and stakeholder engagement. 
• Developed PL/SQL-materialized views to efficiently filter and aggregate millions of records, 
optimizing performance for Tableau reporting. 
• Led a team of 4 contractors to develop Tableau reports aligned with business requirements, 
ensuring accurate data representation and timely delivery. 
• Responsible and accountable to perform quality assurance of the system, user acceptance 
testing, system integration testing of entire suite of Tableau reports. 
• Responsible and accountable for FATCA FISMA fail over/Fall Back process. Executed activities, 
meetings, reporting, and key information required to effectively executed the annual FATCA ASP 
exercise.  
• Created FATCA ASP Lessons Learned / Playbook to document the process.

meetings, reporting, and key information required to effectively executed the annual FATCA ASP

• Reviewed weekly status report and updated the FATCA Master Schedule. 
• Maintained a consolidated project schedule for the Data Services branch, coordinated cross-
functional team updates, and delivered weekly progress to senior management. 
• Provided production support by trouble shooting and helping the team to resolve critical issues to 
ensure system stability and minimal downtime. 
• Consistently followed up with cross-functional teams and submitted timely status updates to the 
IMS team; documented all changes and ensured adherence to process during major schedule 
adjustments.

Test Lead, Sr. QA/QA Analyst 
 
Environment:  
Mercury Testing Tools (Quick Test Pro), Dot net, ASP, HTML, XML, Java script, Python, VB script, 
Business Objects, SAP, SAP MDM, Oracle, Peoplesoft, Siebel, Windows XP\Vista, Office 
2000\2003\2007 (MS Word, MS Excel, PPT), PPS, Flash, Adobe, Unix, bug tracking tools Test Track Pro, 
Jira and Interact. 
 
Responsibilities:  
 
• Responsible in writing and executing software Use cases and Test cases. These Scripts were 
developed after reviewing the business requirements document, Use-cases and technical 
specifications document. 
• Updating the test cases based on the new requirements for that release. 
• Performed GUI, Functional, System-Integration, Regression and Load\stress testing.  
• Maintained requirements and requirements are traced to Test Cases in Interact or traced back to 
the Traceability Matrix. 
• Performed Regression test using Quick Test Pro. Tracked and Reported Defects using Interact, 
Test Track Pro and Jira.

the Traceability Matrix.

and Submitted status reports weekly.  
• Actively participated in updated the release notes to my assigned components. 
• Assigned work to different tester within the organization. 
• Keep track of all the time and work each tester did per that week. 
• Conducted discussion meetings with appropriate people if there is problem for which a solution 
needs to be discussed. 
• Participated and gave demo’s in company conferences with clients. 
• Making sure that no sev1 and sev2 defect will be there before the release by conducting bug 
review meeting during stabilization.
